DOC.brief_summary: While Diacutaneous fibrolysis ( DF ) achieve promising result empirically , effectiveness test clinical trial . The investigator hypothesize use DF patient suffer painful shoulder would increase active mobility reduce pain movement . To test hypothesis double blind ( patient investigator ) randomize clinical trial carry two public Primary Health Care Centres . Fifty patient randomly allocate two group : intervention group , receive real DF session , control group , receive placebo DF session .
DOC.detailed_description: Background objective : Diacutaneous fibrolysis ( DF ) manual technique treat mechanical pain musculoskeletal system . While technique achieve promising result empirically , effectiveness test clinical trial . We aim evaluate effectiveness single session DF pain mobility patient suffer painful shoulder . Subjects method : This clinical trial take place two public Primary Health Care Centres . Fifty patient randomly allocate two group : intervention group , receive real DF session , control group , receive placebo DF session . The degree active mobility ( flexion , abduction , extension , external internal rotation ) , pain hand behind back position participant 's perception technique term comfort result obtain measure .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age refer treatment painful shoulder ( except adhesive capsulitis ) previously treat DF Damaged skin and/or cutaneous lesion shoulder area History shoulder surgery Vascular abnormality Platelet antiaggregant therapy Acute inflammatory condition shoulder ( < 1 week ) Patients pending litigation court claim
